article: My name is John Brown. I am a school boy. My school is  far from  my home. Every day I spend a lot of time  getting  there. The  _  is not good, so I can't ride my bike to school. I often take a bus there. It usually  _  me forty minutes to get there  by bus  . I  get up  at seven every morning. I have no time for breakfast at home. I often have something for breakfast on the bus  _  at school. I don't want to  be late for  school. Most students in our school take buses to school. Some students walk to school  _  their homes are not far.  A small number of  the students ride bikes.
